item.title: About The Site
item.description:
Welcome to the website, home of Collin Dougherty’s data driven insights (and occasional rambles). On the site you will find some examples of my work. You can find a host of different topics covered in depth, including stock markets, cryptocurrencies, baseball, football, basketball and more.

I seek to use data and statistical machine learning to derive useful insights in all of these topics and more, whether it be a stock market trade idea or a prediction for a team’s performance in March Madness.

Lastly, I encourage you to check out my Twitter, where I post more frequently and on a wider variety of topics. My articles often make the most sense in that context. Check out my twitter here.

Collin Dougherty is a Data Analyst and Researcher at UNMC in Surgical Oncology. He is particularly interested in how data can be used in a wide variety of fields, including cancer research, sports analytics, stock trading, and more. He worked in the field of sports analytics with the University of Nebraska. Learn more about Collin here.
